entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
